item.title: Global.health
item.description: Fenris worked with the Global.health leadership team to help align product development with long-term strategic objectives and to deliver value for the sector. Our team helped G.h leaders refine a vision through a series of workshops. With the product team, we co-developed programs and objectives that were consistent with this vision and with constraints. Inviting input from advisors and stakeholders, a strategic product roadmap with a three-year horizon was drafted for G.
